body:
thank you very very very much for this  it is now a hell lot faster .. the main draw back, it is still crashing after 200-300 runs  i'm using splitmass component because i need it for further geometrical complexity in the future of the research  i don't know if it 's the RAM issue any more as it never exceeded 2 GBs in comparison to almost 11 GBs in the previous version  i'm now trying to run on a PC instead of my laptop so it might be more stable  any how thank you and i'll keep you noted.
regards anas
